org.mini2Dx.core.geom

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Shape
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Rectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parallelogram
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CollisionBox, ConcurrentPointQuadTree, PointQuadTree

    public class Rectangle
extends Shape
implements Parallelogram
    Implements a rectangle.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        Default constructor. Creates a Rectangle at 0,0 with a width and height of 1
